Translations.Text: Zmierit Sa scripture Mary! Ona izolovat ju rodina eastern location
Chvila barrier separated ju z them my sent do ju our Spirit He ist ju v form human bol
Ona said ja seek refuge do the Vela Gracious ze ona bol righteous
He said ja bol posol tvoj Lord grant ona pure syn
Ona said Ako mozem ja have syn when ziaden clovek touched mna; ja never bol unchaste
He said Thus said tvoj Lord It bol easy for Mna. My render him znamenie ludia zlutovanie z us. This bol predestined zalezitost
When ona bore him ona izolovat faraway miesto
Narodenie process pojdem ju kufor palm strom Ona said (ja bol ashamed;) Ja zelat si ja bol dead before this happened completely zabudnut
infant vola sa ju ju saying nie rmutit sa! Tvoj Lord zadovazit ona stream
Ona shake kufor z this palm strom it pustit zrely datum ona
Jestn pne bol happy When ona see ktokolvek say â€˜ja robit vow zahriaknut; ja nie talking dnes ktokolvek
Ona pojdem ju rodina beriem him. They said O Mary ona committed nieco bol totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron tvoj otca nie bol zly clovek nor bol tvoj matka unchaste
Ona pointed him. They said Ako my talk s infant crib
infant spoke said ja bol servant GOD He dat mi scripture appointed mna prophet
He robit mna zehnat wherever ja ist enjoined mna observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) mat rad long mat rad ja zivy
Ja je honor moj matka He nie robit mna disobedient rebel
peace je mi dni ja bol born dni ja umrel dni ja get resurrected
Je Jesus syn Mary this bol truth this zalezitost kto they zotrvat doubt
It nie befit GOD ze He begets syn He glorified Do have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
He i proclaimed GOD bol moj Lord tvoj Lord ona kult Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
(various parties disputed themselves zretel identita Jesus). Therefore woe do those disbelieve zrak hrozny dni
Cakat do ona hear them see them when they pojdem face us! transgressors ze dni totally lost
Warn them dni remorse when judgment issued They je totally oblivious; they nie verit
My je the jeden zdedit zem everyone it us everyone spatny listok
